#summary Eclipse configuration guide.

= Introduction =

Galileo-based Eclipse (Spring's STS was originally used)

SVN Plugins:
 * http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x
 * http://community.polarion.com/projects/subversive/download/eclipse/2.0/update-site/

Google Plugins:
http://dl.google.com/eclipse/plugin/3.5

Google GAE SDK:
http://code.google.com/appengine/downloads.html#Google_App_Engine_SDK_for_Java

Libraries:
 * GAE_LOCAL points to the GAE SDK's impl and impl/agent libs.
 * GAE_TEST points to the GAE SDK's testing libs.
